sentences.en: Alarmed, Hung - chien urged her to rouse herself a little so as not to disappoint Hsin - mei .
sentences.cn: 鸿 渐 发急,劝她勉强振作一下,别辜负 辛楣 的盛意.

sentences.en: Celia said,'I must try not to disappoint them '.
sentences.cn: 莉亚说: “ 我力争不让他们败兴而归. ”

sentences.en: Don't disappoint me by being late again.
sentences.cn: 别再迟到了,不要叫我失望.

sentences.en: For most people, active trading and asset allocation will disappoint.
sentences.cn: 对于多数人而言, 积极的交易和资产配置都将令人失望.

sentences.en: Great things were expected of this band, and they didn’t disappoint.
sentences.cn: 大家对这支乐队的期望很高，而他们也不负众望。

sentences.en: He's building me up too much — I may disappoint him.
sentences.cn: 他将我捧上了天,我可能会令他失望.

sentences.en: Her decision to cancel the concert is bound to disappoint her fans.
sentences.cn: 她决定取消这场音乐会，肯定会使她的歌迷失望。

sentences.en: Her decision to cancel the concert is bound to disappoint her fans.
sentences.cn: 她决定取消这场音乐会，肯定会使她的歌迷失望。

sentences.en: I can't disappoint my public by retiring.
sentences.cn: 我可不能退休,否则大家会失望的.

sentences.en: I knew the pheasants here would disappoint you.
sentences.cn: 我知道,这里的野鸡可能使你有点扫兴.

sentences.en: I promised to buy my son a new bicycle but I had to disappoint him.
sentences.cn: 我答应给儿子买辆新自行车,可我不得不让他失望了.

sentences.en: I'm sorry to disappoint you, but I don't care about my career!
sentences.cn: 很抱歉让你失望了, 不过,我并不在乎我的职业!

sentences.en: I'm sorry to disappoint your hope.
She knew that she would disappoint him.
sentences.cn: 她知道她会令他失望的。

sentences.en: They don't expect much from you, so you can't disappoint'em.
sentences.cn: 他们不会对你要求太多, 因此你也不会让他们感到失望.

words.tran_cn: 失望的，沮丧的；受挫折的
令人失望的；令人扫兴的
令人失望（disappoint的ing形式）；辜负…的期望

trans.tran_en: to make someone feel unhappy because something they hoped for did not happen or was not as good as they expected
to make someone feel unhappy because something they hoped for did not happen or was not as good as they expected
